name: Home Seeker
description:
Home Seeker is an One Button Game.

With Super Mario Bros as main inspiration, I decide to made a game where you to attain the end of the level to win. I didn't want to make an endless one which is often made.

Control:

- Change direction (click)

- Jump (double click)

- Crouch (hold click)

- Climb ladder (click near ladder)

This is a short game with only 3 levels so far, but despite that I hope you will have fun plating it.

DISCLAIMER:

I work on this game alone using UE5. 

All the texture asset are from the asset pack Sunny Land on Itch.io

The music and SFX are from precedent project of mine thus free.
